title: Rescue Orin's Victim
content: clues from Investigate the Murders) and get the Amulet of Bhaal. In order to enter the Murder Tribunal, remove the Painting "Buttefly on Skull" in Candulhallow's Tombstones, then press the button. You need to hand in bag of hands from Dolor (Investigate the Murders) or the hand of Gortash to gain entry to Murder Tribunal. Or you can fight That Which Guards. In the Murder Tribunal, you will face Sarevok Anchev (Final Boss of BG1 and a Child of Bhaal), Echo of Sendai (Drow Bhaalspawn, boss of BG2:
